mapper.select: SELECT m.*, t.template_type_content FROM weiit_weixin_public_template_msg m inner join weiit_weixin_public_template_type t on m.template_type_id = t.template_type_id WHERE authorizer_id = #{authorizer_id}
mapper.insert: insert into weiit_weixin_public_template_msg (template_type_id, template_type_num, template_msg_name, wx_template_id, state, create_time, update_time, authorizer_id, business_type) values (#{template_type_id}, #{template_type_num}, #{template_msg_name}, #{wx_template_id}, #{state}, now(), now(), #{authorizer_id}, #{business_type})
